title: Resume | Rashid Al-Sayaghi
about_text_old: I am a system developer and IT expert from Yemen. I have extensive experience in developing web and mobile applications. I currently work as a system developer at Ebda Soft for private systems, and I am always striving to improve my skills and keep up with modern technology.
about_text: I am an enthusiastic and detail-oriented developer with a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions in dynamic environments. Over the course of my career, I have honed my skills in responsive design, version control using Git, and integrating APIs for seamless functionality and IT Support.
about_text_2: My career goal is to leverage my passion for clean, efficient code and user-centric design to contribute innovative solutions in a collaborative and growth-oriented team. With a keen eye for emerging technologies and a commitment to continuous learning, I am excited to bring my technical proficiency, creativity, and strong problem-solving skills to your esteemed organization.
